1.0.0.name: wordpress/pendig-reviews-dashboard-widget
1.0.0.description: The Widget shows a list of pending reviews of posts and pages (you can hide the page entrys from the list). Also in the configuration part of the widget you can set how many pending entrys you would like to display or hide the date or author information.
